item.title: Trouble With Herb
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

Not really trouble, just a question can i put two statics in one class?

[code]/*
Herblore
By Zach
*/

public class Herblore {

static void itemonItem(client, c, int Item, int Item2,) {

	/*Making Potions*/

if(Item == **** && Item2 == **** || Item == **** && Item2 == ****) {
	c.makePotion(Item, Item2, ****, 9, 230, 1623, "Attack Potion"); //Attack Potion
}
if(Item == **** && Item2 == **** || Item == **** && Item2 == ****) {
	c.makePotion(Item, Item2, ****, 15, 460, 1820, "Strength Potion"); //Strength Potion
}
if(Item == **** && Item2 == **** || Item == **** && Item2 == ****) {
	c.makePotion(Item, Item2, ****, 19, 585, 2021, "Defense Potion"); //Defense Potion
}
if(Item == **** && Item2 == **** || Item == **** && Item2 == ****) {
	c.makePotion(Item, Item2, ****, 24, 732, 2323, "Restore Potion"); //Restore Poition
}


	/*Cleaning Herbs*/
static void onItem(client, c, int Item,) {

if(Item == **** || Item == ****) {
	c.cleanHerb(Item, ****, 1, 80, 930, ("Clean Guam"); //Grimy Guam - Clean Guam
}
if(Item == **** || Item == ****) {
	c.cleanHerb(Item, ****, 8, 324, 1723, ("Clean Marrentil"); //Grimy Marrentil - Clean Marrentil
}

}[/code]

I haven’t finished, I haven’t added in the item id’s yet. I’m not sure if i have all of the models. That’s what the **** are for.

Read full topic
